metadata.title: CVE-2024-22262 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Applications that use UriComponentsBuilder to parse an externally providedURL (e.g. through a query parameter) AND perform validation checks on thehost of the parsed URL may be vulnerable to a  open redirecthttps://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/601.html  attack or to a SSRF attackif the URL is used after passing validation checks.This is the same as  CVE-2024-22259https://spring.io/security/cve-2024-22259  and  CVE-2024-22243https://spring.io/security/cve-2024-22243 , but with different input.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
